channel.title: Movies on Cesario's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on Cesario's Website

item.title: 12 Angry Men
item.description:
My Review

This film centers on a jury of 12 men who must decide the verdict in the case of an 18-year-old defendant. After the evidence is presented, the jurors are sequestered in a room to deliberate the young man’s fate. If found guilty, he will be sentenced to death by the electric chair.

When the initial vote is taken, eleven jurors vote guilty. Only one, Juror #8, who we later learn is named Mr. Davis, votes not guilty.

item.title: The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King
item.description:
My Review

Cinema peaked when this movie came out.

It’s absolute perfection, 3h of pure entertainment, joy and even some tears.

DEATHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!

FOR FRODO!!!!!!!!!

item.title: The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers
item.description:
My Review

No review needed, best trilogy ever, no questions asked.

5/5

item.title: The Lord of the Rings - Fellowship of the Ring
item.description:
My Review

The Fellowship of the Ring and The Lord of the Rings trilogy are much more than movies, they really are a vibe.

Fellowships starts by introducing us to the world of Middle Earth, with Galadriel’s iconic monologue, and from there, the movie takes you on an awesome adventure to Rivendell.

There is friendship, combat, courage, danger, amusement, and much much more.. What more do you need?

I find myself rewatching the movies over and over again when I have nothing to do at home, they’re that good.
